item.title: [525] Fishing [Request]
item.dc:creator: @ownerz12 ownerz12
item.description:
@ownerz12 wrote:

My fishing file is missing some things… Someone post me a code for fishing?
Here is my fishing.java class:

[code]interface Fishing {

void handleAttempting();

}[/code]
And the FishingProtocol class:

[code]public class FishingProtocol implements Fishing {

Player player;

public FishingProtocol(Player player) {
    this.player = player;
}

/**
 * Fishing attempting.
 */
public void handleAttempting() {
    getOwner().getActionSender().sendMessage(getOwner(), "hi.");
}

Player getOwner() {
    return player;
}

}[/code]
Currently, even at level 1 fishing, I can fish sharks… Also, all fishing spots require no level or equipment (like small fish net or harpoon) to fish… So could someone throw a code in to add full fishing?

Read full topic
